home.title: Kumusta, ako si PmpoliDev
home.subtitle: Roblox Developer na may 3+ taon na karanasan • Eksperto sa Lua (Roblox Studio)

about.title: Tungkol sa Akin
about.description: Ako ay isang Roblox developer na may higit sa tatlong taong karanasan. Kaya kong gumawa ng mga realistic wave system, mag-optimize ng scripts at games, at mag-develop ng PvP abilities para sa NPC.
about.point1: Gumawa ng data saving systems gamit ang DataStore
about.point2: Gumawa ng custom GUI, animation, at physics-based systems

project1.title: Roblox Game “SuperPark”
project1.desc: Isang parkour-style game na may custom animations at GUI.

project2.title: Skateboard System
project2.desc: Custom physics gamit ang Raycasts at makinis na animations.

product1.name: Custom Roblox Avatar
product1.desc: Personalized avatar design para sa iyong Roblox profile.

product2.name: Game Script Pack
product2.desc: Package ng custom Lua scripts (cooldowns, GUI, atbp.).

contact.title: Makipag-ugnay & Social Media
